name: LISDEX TEVA 30 MG
treatmentDescriptions: Lisdex Teva is a central nervous system (CNS) stimulant indicated for the treatment of Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder (ADHD) in patients ages 6 years and above. Lisdex Teva is indicated for the treatment of Moderate to Severe Binge Eating Disorder (BED) for patient over 18 years. Limitation of Use: Lisdex Teva is not indicated or recommended for weight loss. Use of other sympathomimetic drugs for weight loss has been associated with serious cardiovascular adverse events. The safety and effectiveness of Lisdex Teva for the treatment of obesity have not been established.
warnings: תרופה מוגבלת לרישום ע'י רופא מומחה או הגבלה אחרת
